# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a masterpiece, designed to exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this product at $200. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
